speechEggArray.avengers: Family assemble! It's time to watch <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.big hero: Hello, I am Baymax, for treatment, I recommend watching <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.evil dead: Hail to the king, baby! Let's watch <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.frozen: Let it go, let it go! Let's sit down and watch <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.heathers: Well, charge me gently with a chainsaw. Or watch <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.space odyssey: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.
speechEggArray.star wars: Help me, Obi-Wan-Kenobi. <TITLE> is my only hope.
speechEggArray.they live: I'm here to chew bubblegum and play <TITLE>, and I'm all out of bubblegum.
speechEggArray.wall-e: Thank you for shopping Buy and Large, and enjoy as we begin <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.monty python: Your mother was a hamster, and your father smelled of elderberries. Playing <TITLE>
speechEggArray.guide to the end of the universe: Hey there, you hoopy frood. I'm going to play <TITLE> for you.
speechEggArray.godfather: I'm going to make you an offer you can't refuse. I'm going to play <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.with the wind: Frankly, my dear, I don't give an iPhone.
speechEggArray.dirty harry: Go ahead, you've already made my day.
speechEggArray.taxi driver: You talkin' to me? Just checking. Playing <TITLE> now.
speechEggArray.apocalypse now: I love the smell of ozone in the morning.
speechEggArray.silence of the lambs: This movie would go great with some fava beans and a nice chianti.
speechEggArray.jerry maguire: Show me the money! And I'll show you <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.a few good men: You can't handle the truth. But maybe you can handle <TITLE>.
speechEggArray.jaws: You're gonna need a bigger boat.
speechEggArray.super troopers: Littering and... Littering and... Littering and watching <TITLE>.

speechGreetingArray: Bonjour. Essayez de me demander de lire quelque chose.
Salut, je suis Flex TV. Que puis-je faire pour vous aujourd'hui ?
Salutations, humain ! Comment puis-je vous aider?

Vous pouvez dire 'Aide' ou 'Que sais-tu faire' pour en savoir à mon propos.
Essayez de me demande de jouer quelque chose, ou dites 'Adire' pour plus de commandes.
